meanings.definition: To dishevel or rumple (hair or clothing)
meanings.sent1: She touzled her hair before going out.
meanings.sent2: The wind touzled the leaves on the trees.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy touzled the blanket on the bed.
meanings.sent4: The mischievous wind touzled the pages of the book.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter touzled the calm of the room.

meanings.sent1: He touzled the kitten gently in his hands.
meanings.sent2: The siblings touzled each other in a friendly wrestling match.
meanings.sent3: The friends playfully touzled over the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: The waves touzled the boat as it sailed through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The wind touzled the kite as it soared in the sky.

meanings.definition: To tousle or mess up (someone's hair)
meanings.sent1: She playfully touzled her brother's hair.
meanings.sent2: The little girl's hair was touzled after playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler touzled the hair of the family dog.
meanings.sent4: The wind touzled her hair as she walked along the beach.
meanings.sent5: The playful breeze touzled the hair of the children at the park.
